ORSHIN Attack Defense Framework

Use test pads to gain privileges

Description

Use test pads to gain privileges

CWE

CVE

Attack Surfaces

Debug Interface (MITRE EMB3D PID-15)

Attack Vectors

Privileged Access Port (MITRE EMB3D TID-116)

Defenses

Attackers should not be allowed to connect to test pads of an IC, Test pads should not be present any more after the engineering and debug phase of the IC.
